page.title: 02SHOPPING IN RYTON,GATESHEAD.
page.content: On the 12th March, 1985, shopping in Ryton changed with the opening of the first large supermarket.It was opened by the{Mayor and Mayoress of {Gateshead.}The supermarket was built for a firm called{Presto}and seems to be quite popular with local shoppers. To find out what people thought we questioned{100}customers and{24% of these were from outside the immediate Ryton area.When asked where they used to shop{62%}said they used to shop outside the Ryton area. Most people came more than once a week and most of them had walked to{Presto, although{29%}had come by car and used {Presto's}own car-park and{11%}used public transport to get to the shop Before{Presto}opened there were a number of small shops and a small supermarket run by the{CO-OP.}
